Jan 5 (Reuters) - Stellantis N.V.:: *STELLANTIS - CO & AMAZON TO COLLABORATE TO DELIVER SOFTWARE SOLUTIONS FOR CO'S NEW DIGITAL CABIN PLATFORM, STARTING IN 2024 *STELLANTIS N.V. - AMAZON TO BE FIRST COMMERCIAL CUSTOMER FOR NEW RAM PROMASTER BATTERY ELECTRIC VEHICLE (BEV) IN 2023 *STELLANTIS N.V. - CO SELECTS AWS AS ITS PREFERRED CLOUD PROVIDER FOR VEHICLE PLATFORMS TO DELIVER ON ITS LONGTERM, SOFTWARE-FOCUSED VISION

  • ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;;))
